name: Artisanal Lighting of the 4th Dimension V4
description:
@ArtPunkDude | Looking at a Fire for a while, but the Fire is Light Coils. Lights, Procedural Coils, Colour unachievable by archaic electric resistance bulbs in the flimsy universal context of  our time, space and physics.

Possible However In a Digital Multiverse. 

On A Personal Note, the Artist of this Used to Design Lighting for Theatre Shows. Then Covid Hit. Now Said Artist Likes Making Impossible Lights In Digital Forms as an Ode to a time probably lost.


This Is V4.
